definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: We report an unusual case of inflammatory fibroid polyp presenting with chronic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个以贫血为表现的炎性纤维息肉的病例。

sentences.english: First, the correct formation of polyps in the bile, prevents the growth of polyps and re-generated.
sentences.chinese: 矫正形成息肉胆汁，阻止息肉的生长与再生成。

sentences.english: First, the correct formation of polyps in the bile, prevents the growth of polyps and re-generated.
sentences.chinese: 矫正形成息肉胆汁，阻止息肉的生长与再生成。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect and safety of colon polyps treated with endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 目的对内镜下治疗结肠息肉的疗效及安全性进行评价。

sentences.english: On colonoscopy, a sessile polyp is seen below.
sentences.chinese: 结肠镜检查，见无蒂息肉。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of electric radio-frequency under endoscope in treating gastrointestinal polypus.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察射频治疗消化道息肉的效果。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the diagnosis and treatment of ureteral polyp.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨输尿管息肉的诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Mass of intestinal polys were seen to be hamartoma, less adenoma were seen, but malignant polys presented adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 息肉以错构瘤为主，可合并腺瘤，恶变后呈腺癌。

sentences.english: Cholecystlithiasis, polyp of gallbladder , hemangioma of liver.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊结石，胆囊息肉，肝血管瘤。

sentences.english: Why did he go in for colon polyp removal?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他会在结肠息肉切除？

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the operating method of broad-based via fibre laryngoscope vocal polyp.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨纤维喉镜下广基声带息肉的手术方式。

sentences.english: Conclusion Uretero-pyelography is useful to diagnose primary ureteral polyps.
sentences.chinese: 结论尿路造影是诊断输尿管息肉的有效方法。
内壁上的息肉一般是要切除的。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hysteroscopy is an effective method for diagnosis and treatment of cervical polyp.
sentences.chinese: 结论宫腔镜在宫颈息肉的诊断及治疗方面有较大优势。

sentences.english: No polyp in ileum pouch was seen.
sentences.chinese: 未发现回肠粪袋息肉形成。

sentences.english: Polyps are an overgrowth of the tissue that lines the uterine cavity or cervix.
sentences.chinese: 息肉是子宫腔或子宫颈内膜过度增生的组织。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
